name: Trapped (itch) (Nikoni)
description:
You are trapped underground. The exit is just up there. But you will have to go through the darkness to reach it. 

Controls:

- Right arrow = right/ left arrow = left

- Up arrow = jump

-Down arrow = pass through platforms

- A = left attack

- D = right attack

- Enter = start the game

- Back Space = back to the main menu

Game made for "The Beginner's Jam".
